what we do
    Bingo
    (Adults Only)
    Get active with the community elders through a game of Bingo! Boxes, Crazy 8's, Shotgun and Speed Bingo!
    Click for more info
    Clay
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    Join the podcast team to tell stories about the community center and the greater city of Baltimore and its community impacts.
    Click for more info
    Dancing
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    Hip-Hop, Modern, Ballet   Baltimore Club Dance starting early 2018.
    Click for more info
    Digital Lab
    (All Ages)
    Our computer lab is open to the public during select hours.
    Click for more info
    Drumming
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    African Drum Lessons every Wednesday.
    Click for more info
    GW Podcast
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    Join the podcast team to tell stories about the community center and the greater city of Baltimore and its community impacts.
    Click for more info
    Music
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    Join the podcast team to tell stories about the community center and the greater city of Baltimore and its community impacts.
    Click for more info
    Noisy Ventures
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    Learn about financial literacy + education, and create + operate micro-businesses.
    Click for more info
    Photography
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    Learn about photography and film as a medium for communal storytelling.
    Click for more info
    Robotics
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    Learn concepts about S.T.E.A.M through planning and building robots using LEGO® bricks.
    Click for more info
    Running Club
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    Join the podcast team to tell stories about the community center and the greater city of Baltimore and its community impacts.
    Click for more info
    Team Autobar
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    Join the podcast team to tell stories about the community center and the greater city of Baltimore and its community impacts.

Discover
Mission
The mission of GWCC is to empower the youth and their families through sustainable programming and innovative partnerships in a safe, community art space.
Vision
A safe, welcoming and inclusive gathering space where opportunities to grow, learn and create are boundless
Our History
Established and operating since 2016. The founding members have a focus on providing programming + new experiences to all community residents.
+ Learn More
Meet the People
Meet the team that works to keep the center servicing all community residents.
+ Learn More
Public Computers + Lending Library
Visit our computer room for general use or our lending library with a great assortment of books + movies
+ Learn More
Visit the Center
The Greenmount West Community Center sits within the Baltimore Montesorri Public Charter School.
+ Get Directions
Volunteer
GWCC Volunteers assist with staff and residents to push the mission forward
+ Apply Now
Donate
GWCC relies on people like you to provide programming, food and events for the youth and their families
+ Support Us
Space Use / Rental
Host your meetings or special events within our community center
+ Contact Us
Greenmount West Community Center
1634 Guilford Avenue
Baltimore, MD 21202
(entrance on 200 block of East Lanvale Street)
Program Hours
  • Monday, Tuesday, Thursday,
    11 AM - 6 PM
  • Wednesday, 1 PM - 6 PM
  • Saturday, 9 AM - 1 PM
Phone
  • (667) 212 - 5286
